channel.title: Multiple Problems
channel.description:
Ok, After I create a new character, within a few minutes I lose connection. Then upon trying to log back in, it either gives me a "character already in use" message or tells me to start the server. No matter how much I start the server over, it gives me the same message. Also, joining on other people's server does not work either. It usually gives me an "unexpected response" message. Also, I am having extreme lag trying to play and access these forums. Screenies can be provided if needed.
Any help?

item.title: Multiple Problems
item.description:
@127.0.0.1 wrote:

how much RAM (random access memory) do you have? sometimes it can be very laggy… i only have 128mb of RAM and i lag bad… here is how you can find out…
start > control panel > performance and maintenance > system

to buy more ram and to get the exzact type go to this secure site it has live help and all!
www.crucial.com on their home page click “scan my system” it will give the amount of ram you have offered ram and all ram that will fit your computer! im buying 1G of ram there soon for only $90.00 and kno whats best? you can pay over the phone

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Problems
item.dc:creator: @halalala halalala
item.description:
@halalala wrote:

I can keep logging in, but on certain characters, if I spawn a bad item it eternally disconnects me. It doesn’t matter how many times I log in, I get disconnected.

Edit: I think I’ve reached 2 concerns: Is moparscape in an early beta, or just never tested before released? Also a large sum of items are bugged, equipping them causes a kick from the server, causing an instant and perma-glitching your character to be disconnected.

Edit2: My character isn’t saving even after I log in and out.

Edit3: Unable to access other’s servers.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 05:29:31 PM[/size][hr]Disregard my questions. A runescape rip-off that gives players advantanges but has WORSE gameplay than the game it poses itself is a bit pointless.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Problems
item.dc:creator: @halalala halalala
item.description:
@halalala wrote:

Restarting the client hasn’t helped. This problem keeps occuring. I’ve also found it happens with some items if I use the “pickup” command. It has happened on multiple names as well.

Read full topic
